text.p: Your oratory prowess deceives others, granting you advantage on any negotiation, intimidation, persuasion, or misdirection check.

Pulling from the eternal flames of the abyss, you can ignite your melee or ranged weapon as part of making an attack. It deals an additional d4 of fire damage on hit. The weaponâ€™s flame is not enough to pierce the darkness.
You wield the relentless energy of the eternal flame in powerful and unique ways. Only one pyromancy talent can be active at a time.
Upon reaching level 2, roll one talent from the Pyromancy table, with additional rolls at every even level.
You are immune to your own pyromancy.
